column1: # Coefficient of variation (CV) for each stochastic parameter used in Monte Carlo simulation.
# A single CV value means the distribution is symmetric around the mean.

column2: cv_high) allows asymmetric sampling bounds in future extensions.

column1: # - parameter: Stochastic parameter name used as dict key in simulation code
# - cv_low: Low end of CV range (currently equal to cv_high for symmetric distributions)
# - cv_high: High end of CV range (currently equal to cv_low for symmetric distributions)
# - description: Brief explanation of the parameter and its volatility basis
# Data source: Representative volatility estimates for arid-region agricultural simulation

column5: Yield variation from weather and pests
